original_text: You have come to Jesus, who brought the new agreement from God to his people. In that agreement, the blood of Jesus' death makes us clean from our sins. It tells us that God has forgiven us. When Cain killed his brother Abel, Abel's blood brought God's punishment. So we see that Jesus' blood brought us something much better than that. 12: Jesus chose to die. But Abel died when his brother killed him. Abel's brother, Cain, killed Abel, and Abel's blood came out onto the ground. See Genesis 4:8-10. So Abel's blood only shows us about bad things. It shows us that God had to punish Cain. But Jesus died for us so that God does not have to punish us any more. You have come to Jesus, who brought the new agreement from God to his people. In that agreement, the blood of Jesus' death makes us clean from our sins. It tells us that God has forgiven us. When Cain killed his brother Abel, Abel's blood brought God's punishment. So we see that Jesus' blood brought us something much better than that.
korean_text: 새 언약의 중보자이신 예수와 및 아벨의 피보다 더 나은 것을 말하는 뿌린 피니라

sentences.original_text: You have come to Jesus
who brought the new agreement
from God to his people
In that agreement
the blood of Jesus' death
makes us clean from our sins
It tells us that God has forgiven us
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님이 우리를 용서하셨다는 것을 알려줍니다

sentences.original_text: When Cain killed his brother Abel
sentences.korean_translation: 가인이 그의 형제 아벨을 죽였을 때

sentences.original_text: Abel's blood brought God's punishment
So we see that Jesus' blood
brought us something much better than that
sentences.korean_translation: 그것보다 훨씬 더 좋은 것을 가져왔다는 것을 봅니다

sentences.original_text: Jesus chose to die
But Abel died
when his brother killed him
Abel's brother, Cain, killed Abel
and Abel's blood came out onto the ground
See Genesis 4:8-10
So Abel's blood only shows us about bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 아벨의 피는 나쁜 것들에 대해서만 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: It shows us that God had to punish Cain
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님이 가인을 벌해야만 했다는 것을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: But Jesus died for us
so that God does not have to punish us any more
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 하나님은 더 이상 우리를 벌하지 않으셔도 됩니다

sentences.original_text: You have come to Jesus
who brought the new agreement from God to his people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그의 백성에게 보내신 새 언약을 가져오신 분

sentences.original_text: In that agreement
the blood of Jesus' death makes us clean from our sins
sentences.korean_translation: 예수의 죽음의 피는 우리를 죄에서 깨끗하게 만듭니다

sentences.original_text: It tells us that God has forgiven us
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님이 우리를 용서하셨다는 것을 알려줍니다

sentences.original_text: When Cain killed his brother Abel
sentences.korean_translation: 가인이 그의 형제 아벨을 죽였을 때

sentences.original_text: Abel's blood brought God's punishment
So we see that Jesus' blood
brought us something much better than that
sentences.korean_translation: 그것보다 훨씬 더 좋은 것을 가져왔다는 것을 봅니다
